raw_comment:
The graph finds that younger generations were more optimistic. 
What recent events happened in Indonesia which might explain as to why they voted so high on the question air. I also wonder what the slope of this graph is, what is the line of symmetry. How would this change how people view the graph.
Shows us the optimistic or pessimistic views of our current generations.
Optimistic Gen Z
ace_sentences: The graph shows that younger generations were more optimistic.
Some people in Indonesia voted high on the air question.
These events might explain the high votes on the air question.
I wonder what the slope of the graph is.
I wonder what the line of symmetry of the graph is.
The slope of the graph may change how people view the graph.
The line of symmetry of the graph may change how people view the graph.
The graph shows optimistic views of current generations.
The graph shows pessimistic views of current generations.
